attributes.action: Make Parliament cancel all holidays until the situation with Brexit is resolved
attributes.additional_details: Parliament has shown abject incompetence and complete failure to come to a resolution.  Between now and the new exit date, there are 10 weeks of scheduled holidays for MPs.  Time is fast running out and Parliament should have no holidays until a consensus is reached and a solution is found.
attributes.background: The current uncertainty surrounding Brexit is causing untold harm to the British economy, concerted and immediate action is now required.
